description: EXTERNAL CHIMNEY FLUE TO EXIT THE END OF TERRACE WALL AT APPROX. 2.6 METRES FROM GROUND AND RISE TO HEIGHT OF ROOF.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Un-numbered site location plan, Un-numbered side elevation and FLEX/TWINWALL ref 65724 ver 2.

Condition : 3 - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE 
The application site is situated in a smoke control area, only DEFRA Approved Appliances can be installed and used. The appliance must only be operated in accordance with the manufacturers guide and permitted fuel used, otherwise the appliance will not comply with the Clean Air Act 1993.

Condition : 5 - In accordance with paragraphs 186 and 187 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   ii) The application was approved without delay.
